localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Blushh is an app where women in Asia listen to short sensual audio stories to explore their fantasies. With a simple monthly subscription, we are an alternative to male-oriented pornography.
nodes.title: Blushh - Sensual stories for women in Asia
nodes.author: SJ

nodes.excerpt: Mochi = Spaced repetition + Zettelkasten + Markdown
nodes.title: Mochi mobile - Take notes in markdown, study them with spaced repetition
nodes.author: Matt Steedman

nodes.excerpt: Veganzone is a new mobile application where people who follow vegan & vegetarian lifestyle can share their common values, meet each other, socialize over the events they create and purchase vegan products.
nodes.title: Veganzone - By vegans for vegans and vegetarians
nodes.author: Murat Aksu

nodes.excerpt: TeenUP was created to give kids a platform to learn new skills each day from their peers. The app allows kids to quickly and easily create short, unique, educational videos to share with friends and the world.
nodes.title: TeenUp - A learning platform designed for teens by teens
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Pastimes is a mobile app and community that makes it easy to connect with like-minded outdoor enthusiasts.
nodes.title: Pastimes - Find friends who do your favorite activities
nodes.author: Forest Good

nodes.excerpt: Get yourself comfortable, turn your phone so the flashlight is facing you, close your eyes then fall effortlessly into an immersive journey through a kaleidoscope of colours created by your subconscious...
nodes.title: Lumenate - Effortlessly explore your subconscious
nodes.author: Tom Galea

nodes.excerpt: pNeura is a platform that enables entrepreneurs to share their progress and connect with other entrepreneurs and investors. Investors can follow their portfolios with ease. Developed by Appello Software.
nodes.title: pNeura - Entrepreneurs Network - EXPLORE STARTUPS AND FOUNDERS
nodes.author: Michelle Badenhorst

nodes.excerpt: TeamTime is the simplest, most streamlined and secure time logging tool (mobile & web) designed specifically for https://basecamp.com users. We created it for https://www.clearbluedesign.com/ourselves after struggling with other tools out there. We share it with you.
nodes.title: TeamTime for Basecamp - Time tracking for teams using Basecamp
nodes.author: Petr Filipchyk

nodes.excerpt: Your favorite tool for sales, marketing, and customer support - erxes - is now available on the go. Keep the ball rolling at any time by managing deals, responding to messages, and updating your CRM. For busy days on the go, erxes mobile is the way to go.
nodes.title: erxes Mobile - Some of the most important CRM and web chat tools on the go
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: ProApp is a place to learn all things Design. It's your Digital Design College to learn various Design disciplines with bite-sized content on the go. We launched with 30+ courses - UI/UX design, HCI, Mobile & Web Design, Typography, Microcopy, & many more.
nodes.title: ProApp Learn Design - Learn the foundations of design principles

nodes.excerpt: Smoothly prepared for Food Intolerance and Vegan Diets. Tasty and healthy smoothie recipes. It serves easy, gluten-free, lactose-free and nut-free recipes for users keen on their health.
nodes.title: Smoothly - Food intolerance and vegan diet recipes

nodes.excerpt: Boostcamp is a free fitness education app for beginners of all levels. We partner with world-class coaches to create workout programs (at-home, gym, cardio) that are progression-based and customizable. Join Boostcamp to learn how to train, not just exercise.
nodes.title: Boostcamp - Free fitness education app for beginners

nodes.excerpt: Yogile is a sleek photo management app that lets you store an unlimited number of photos without worrying about running out of storage on your phone or computer.
nodes.title: Yogile - Photo storage simplified
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: RelaxTax is the first App in Austria, that is able to create automated tax returns with an electronic submission & follow up to the Austrian Tax Authorities (FinanzOnline). It is available in multiple languages, currently German & English, with more to come.
nodes.title: RelaxTax - Simplified tax returns for Austria
nodes.author: Chris Eberl

nodes.excerpt: Mobile remote 1-on-1 coaching powered by video for precision feedback. Work with an elite coach who'll *see* your every workout and provide supportive guidance.
nodes.title: System2 - Video-powered 1-on-1 fitness coaching by elite trainers ğŸ’ª

nodes.excerpt: We can not share links when we are speaking in podcasts or clubhouse rooms. Hupu, creates numbers for your links and people who wants to reach, enter number to hupu app or webpage and reach links without sign-in.
nodes.title: Hupu - Share a link with your audience via numbers
nodes.author: BahadÄ±r Kaya

nodes.excerpt: Postmodern is a mobile app designed for ephemeral, one-on-one, anonymous conversations. Whether we seek to explore our own minds, or the structures of our society, we need communication tools that allow us to peel away the pollutants to our thought.
nodes.title: Postmodern. - Short, anonymous conversations with strangers.
nodes.author: Nathaniel

nodes.excerpt: Quill is the best way to message with a team or group. Built for productivity and focus, Quill reduces notifications, collects conversations into threads, and gets out of your way â€” so you can get back to doing what you do best.
nodes.title: Quill - Messaging to make your team better
nodes.author: Jordan Borth

nodes.excerpt: An intuitive method without piano sheet music No more need to know anymore how to decipher piano sheet music or to know music theory. In a few seconds, you recognize the notes to be played on a keyboard. More than 1,000 songs from every genre and skill level
nodes.title: La Touche Musicale - You can learn piano online easily with the songs you love
nodes.author: Joris Astier

nodes.excerpt: Pulse is a private, 27,000+ verified member community for technology leaders to learn from their peers. Members can ask questions, create polls, and engage in conversations for instant insights. Over 16,000+ new data points are gathered each week in Pulse.
nodes.title: Pulse - A community for technology leaders to learn from each other
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Just as the Trello board revolutionized team collaboration by making it visual, simple, and fun for anyone, Trelloâ€™s new views are taking teamwork to places never seen before.
nodes.title: The New Trello - Going beyond the board
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: About BebeSleep - Free offering of some 60 different pieces of white noise for your baby to enter into sleep - Premium sound sources to restore your baby's healthy sleep pattern - Soundscape from around the globe to develop your baby's hearing ability
nodes.title: BebeSleep - BebeSleep is dedicated to helping your baby sleep
nodes.author: Yongwon Lee

nodes.excerpt: Todayist helps busy folks fit what matters most into their day. Prioritize your goals, tasks, and most importantly: YOURSELF. Stay inspired with bite-sized activities tailored to you. Download on iOS and Android to live your life with purpose.ğŸ’š
nodes.title: Todayist - Your friendly planning tool to make the most of every day
